Class PokemonCardGame

java.lang.Object
PokemonCardGame
public class PokemonCardGame extends Object
A pokemon game consists of two players each player has a name of course this runs the pokemon game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    PokemonCardGame()
    constructs a game inputs two players into the game and sets the game up

    • checkWinner

      public boolean checkWinner()
      checks the prize pile of both players. if zero the game wins
      Returns:

      public void runGame()
      runs the game while the players prize piles are greater than zero, loop both players turns each player turn consists the turn method from player class and checks the winning conditions to break loop and crown the winner
